com.revature.rideshare.matching.clients

Interface UserClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserClientFallback

    @FeignClient(name="user-service",
             fallback=UserClientFallback.class)
public interface UserClient
    A Feign client for accessing the user service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User findById(int id) 
      java.util.List<User> findByOfficeAndRole(int officeId, java.lang.String role)
      Finds all the users who work at the given office and have the given role.

    • Method Detail

      • findByOfficeAndRole

        @GetMapping(path="/users",
            params={"office","role"},
            produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
java.util.List<User> findByOfficeAndRole(@RequestParam(value="office")
                                                                                                                                                                    int officeId,
                                                                                                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="role")
                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String role)
        Finds all the users who work at the given office and have the given role.
        Parameters:
        officeId - the ID of the office whose employees to find
        role - the role of the users to find
        Returns:
        all users matching the office and role criteria
